website_summaries.verdict: Does not include lids, but trays can be stacked easily. Rubbermaid uses a more durable hard plastic than bargain models. Produces smaller cubes, but more of them at a time.
cons: Ice cube size is exceptionally small

customer_reviews.title: Cracked in 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I was quite happy with these ice cube trays until today, 3 weeks after receipt. Easy to flex, ice drops out pretty easily, but alas the first crack appeared today so I have no hopes for longevity. I bought these because of the Rubbermaid branding. Strangely only the paper cover had Robbermaid branding and the trays themselves have no Rubbermaid identification.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well built ice trays
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy. Just well built, solid ice trays. I have had a set previously, for many years. Eventually, they get brittle and can't be used. This is true of all plastic ice trays. This is my third set of Rubbermaid ice cube trays.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: That these ice trays are the only ones that fit in my freezer.
customer_reviews.text: I like them. I don't know why I can't buy at a local store. But, thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Durability Issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought these ice trays mainly because of the Rubbermaid name and they did great at first, but after a few months they cracked and leaked. I was disappointed because I thought they would hold up better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Forfer

customer_reviews.title: Might just need more!
customer_reviews.text: Not because they broke, but because how good they last, which I knew before ordering them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Simple and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Like this item very much. Was what I wanted, simple, standard tray's and the cubes pop out easily and don't hold onto your cubes causing you to have broken cubes (aka crushed ice) or having to wait a few minutes for temp to rise before they will release.
customer_reviews.author: noreallee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Love these. Sets in half the time as regular cheap trays and cubes come out so great...
customer_reviews.author: Irene Taylor

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: In almost daily use for over a year (no ice maker in my apartment's fridge), have held up well. The plastic feels thin, like I could break them if I twisted them too hard when removing the cubes, so I've been gentle with them, not really giving them a stress test. If they felt sturdier, I'd give them five stars.
customer_reviews.author: The Other Mike

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing these ice cube trays. I bought my first set in college almost a decade ago and they finally began to break. My new set appears to be just as durable. The set stacks perfectly and the ice comes right out when you apply a gentle twist. A little tip - don't over fill the trays. Otherwise, they will feeze together when stacked.
customer_reviews.author: T. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The seller was great received quickly & as promised. Unfortunately the trays are terrible, so flimsy, when you lift them, after filling the water goes all over the place..due to poor design.
customer_reviews.author: acustomer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These ice trays stack easily but I wish the cubes were bigger.
customer_reviews.author: D in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Will be ordering more soon....... Great product that does NOT stick together or have trouble getting the cubes out. The cubes are smaller then my other ice trays....but more surface for the beverage to cool based on the smaller cubes. Very good product. Buy, drink and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Karl Jungel

customer_reviews.title: The best ice trays ever! (Well, for me.)
customer_reviews.text: These are the best ice trays I've ever owned. I have an ice maker in my fridge, but I like to make my ice with filtered water and these are great! I purchased these back in early 2010 and they are still holding up! They are perfect. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had to pry out my bone broth cubes
customer_reviews.text: The plastic on these ice cube trays is very flimsy and doesn't hold when you twist the trays. I intended to use these for freezing my bone broth, but I basically had to pry out the cubes with a knife. Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Linnaete

customer_reviews.title: Cubes a bit smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: It's a quality ice cube tray. The stacking mechanism seems unstable at first, but it gets the job done. It's nice to be able to stack them for ice, but also have them fit together for storage purposes. My main gripe is that the ice cubes turn out smaller than a traditional tray.
customer_reviews.author: Konstar

customer_reviews.title: I needed good plastic ice trays.
customer_reviews.text: Most of my online shopping starts with Amazon.com. As nearly always, I find exactly what I need at a reasonable price. Rubbermaid Ice Trays were exactly what I was looking for at a price that was reasonable. Standard shipping was prompt and they were delivered well packaged. So far the Ice Trays have held up well and are well made. They are exactly as advertized and they are what I expect from a brand name like Rubber Maid.
customer_reviews.author: finnsherman

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: I chose this item based on the good reputation of Rubbermaid. I'm very disappointed. The trays are next to impossible to stack without the top tray sliding into the one below. In addition, the cubes themselves are very small.
customer_reviews.author: maelos

customer_reviews.title: Ice Cube tray is America's Most Wanted
customer_reviews.text: You know how hard it is to find a good ice cube tray set? Not to mention one that isn't going to bust or crack in a few uses? I couldn't find a normal ice cube tray set at my local Wallymart or Tarjet so off to the Amazon jungle I go!
customer_reviews.author: pwNtoriousM

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby food
customer_reviews.text: Far cheaper than speciality trays for baby food. I freeze cubes overnight and then put them into freezer bags, so no need for a lid. I love how they stack on one another without sinking into the one below, yet can nest together when not in use. Easy to twist and pop out the food cubes, too, not matter how sticky the food item.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Ferbert

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. The only problem is that it bends over time. But not much to review here. Just an ice tray after all.
customer_reviews.author: Brewer's wife

customer_reviews.title: turns water into little ice blocks to cool your drinks
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says its going to do. yeah maybe the ice gets stuck every once in a while. oh well
customer_reviews.author: iCON686

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Ice tray
customer_reviews.text: The ice tray was cheap and it freezes ice. There not much more to say. If you can find something cheaper, buy it. Otherwise, this is a fine ice tray.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bridgewater

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not exceptional
customer_reviews.text: When the ice cube trays that came with the fridge wore out, we first tried cheap trays from a local store. Those broke within a few weeks. We then bought six different kinds online. This tray fills and empties easily, but it doesn't lay flat and doesn't stack. It has to sit on a shelf in the freezer by itself, or on top of something flat. The white Rubbermaid trays are much better. We bought a dozen of them.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price, good quality, prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: The ice cube trays are excellent. They are not expensive and they are durable and do the job. Delivery was very quick.
customer_reviews.author: CD music collector

customer_reviews.title: Good-quality Material; Rather Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: These ice trays are good and flexible, even when cold. They stand up to the dishwasher nicely (I washed them before using them). Unfortunately, they don't fit together when full, as I had rather expected, so stacking them in the freezer is problematic, and the stack is shaky and unstable. If you don't have to stack them, then they should be just fine; if you do need to stack your ice trays, then a different design would probably work better for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia K.

customer_reviews.title: The cubes are smaller than you may expect, but the trays work beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had realized it made smaller than normal cubes but other than that I love these. I needed to replace some trays that cracked over the past two years and other than the smaller cubes it looks like these may be just what the doctor ordered. I may just need to get a second set to help me keep up with the demands of summer beverages, but I have time to do that.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I first thought!
customer_reviews.text: I first reviewed these right after buying them which was a mistake. These trays were cheap to buy but they're so cheaply made that they crack and split after only a few months use and the cubes are small so they don't last very long. I recently purchased the heavier white trays also sold by Amazon and I am much happier with them. They're made from much heavier plastic and make much larger cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Sazerac7

customer_reviews.title: These did not last very long.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know maybe i twisted them to hard i'm just not sure,but i know that they should have lasted a lot longer than what they did. Mine CRACKED mostly on the top so you can't very well fill them without making a mess. So needless to say i was disappointed and i don't recommend,it's too bad because i like Rubbermaid just not these. If you do decide to buy these then be super careful when loosening the cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: cubes are to small
customer_reviews.text: the cubes are way to small, cost for the two items to high for what your buying
customer_reviews.author: spearsey

customer_reviews.title: IT'S RUBBERMAID WHAT CAN I SAY
customer_reviews.text: I had the need for ice cube trays because my refrigerator where I was renting didn't have an ice make as my previous households have had. First in searching for these trays I tried going to Target, Home Goods, and Crate and Barrel think they would carry ice cube trays. Now Target said they carried them in the store, but where they had them, I'll never know, I went to the same Target many times and never found them. Who would have thought that it would be that difficult finding ice cube trays? Well it was and I found them on here and then they were made by Rubbermaid, that's a double bonus
customer_reviews.author: StephTX

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Lasted only 6 weeks before they cracked (bought 4 and 2 are cracked). Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Taylor R. Valentin

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for making baby food
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about 3 months now, and they've been great! I make up batches of pureed baby food and freeze it in cubes so we can parcel it out as needed. With a quick pass under hot water, the frozen food pops out easily. Normally I wouldn't review an ICE CUBE TRAY, but found it helpful to see reviews when I embarked on the baby food-making journey.
customer_reviews.author: Pennyheart

customer_reviews.title: no stick ice trays!
customer_reviews.text: Ice trays I've used in the past have been tough to get the cubes out of sometimes. Not so here! I only wish they stacked better so they didn't take up so much room in the freezer. As they are in the picture, they fit right inside each other, so before the ice sets, you can't stack them or it would just push out the water from the bottom tray.
customer_reviews.author: thaichicken

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: As ice cube trays go, these are OK. They haven't cracked like the other brand I used to buy (Sterilite -- stay away from those because they break easily). They're light and the cubes come out in one piece. The cubes are a bit small but overall they're good trays.
customer_reviews.author: Review Man

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: First off, there were little plastic hairs on mine, that I had to pull off before using. Secondly they aren't very strong. They bow, so you have to hold them in the middle while transporting them from the sink to your freezer. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great trays
customer_reviews.text: These trays have been chugging along for me for a couple of years now, and they have worked great. I got these when i was in college originally. They work well, and they make good ice cubes. No sharp edges and always come out of the trays easily.
customer_reviews.author: begoldn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: As noted, just flip the top tray around and it will stack on the other one. They fit together to make for easy storage if you don't need them. Overall - great product, no cracking, no breakage after several months of use.
customer_reviews.author: RaeQuinn

customer_reviews.title: Too light & flimsey
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4. All of them cracked after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: dwight

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is just as advertised nothing special and nothing bad.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My experience, they start cracking and leaking after about 24 uses.
customer_reviews.author: oldupa

customer_reviews.title: It's...an ice tray?
customer_reviews.text: I really don't understand all the anger over a cheap ice tray. I mean, if it cracks, recycle it. It's plastic. But I've had an excellent experience with it. I'm a nurse at a school for small children and I go through a lot of ice. A lot. The bane of my existence is expensive ice trays that don't flex to let me twist the ice out, because I need to be able to make ice as quickly as it will freeze. This lets me do that and is cheap. They stack on top of each other without falling inside each other. All in all, it meets my needs and that's all I ask out of a $4 product.
customer_reviews.author: Audra L. Whitton

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite ice trays. I had some, but after a lot of wear they began to leak some. I looked locally and couldn't find them, so I found them here. They are the best! These new ones have lasted longer and done better than the locally bought ones. Don't know why. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Got two trays so i won't be needing to refill it as often
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Ice Ice Ice!!!
customer_reviews.text: The ice trays work really well. They stack easily on top of each other, and its extremely easy to extract the ice. I've been using it for the past 6 months regularly and there have been absolutely no issues with these. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: P.Rao

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: So these are the easiest trays to get ice out of that I've ever owned. I hate having to fight to get the cubes out! But after a while, they will break (which sadly mine did... but after a pretty long 2 1/2 years). But they're so cheap who cares?
customer_reviews.author: Allison G Hansard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best ice cube trays. They twist well to release the ice and never stick.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Ice cubes pop out easily. Light in weight so you can carry to ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected and more from Rubbermaid. Ice cubes pop out easily. Light in weight so you can carry to freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B.

customer_reviews.title: Large Ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: Great package! The ice cubes are large and fill a nalgene water bottle completely! Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: College Student

customer_reviews.title: not what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: my nieces and nephews drop the ice tray all the time; i was looking for an ice tray made out of rubber this is some hard plastic ice tray that will soon enough break once in the hands on them again...but good for the price, i guess and took too long to come
customer_reviews.author: demonfoxnaruto3

customer_reviews.title: nice cube trays .
customer_reviews.text: The ice cubes pop out quickly and easily The trays stack well Seems very durable I may order another set
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G. Raikos

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to get the ice cubes out and they don't fit one on top of the other unless you let one tray harden first.
customer_reviews.author: Brillant Barbara

customer_reviews.title: My ice cube trey better then yours, it brings all the drinks to the yard
customer_reviews.text: I do not know why there are bad reviews. I have only used it once but damn do these make getting the cubes out easy. I like the shape of the ice, it is different. The trey has a nice feel to it as well, it is easy on the hands. I would say this is the best ice cube treys I have even used. To expand on that would be a waste of time, if you are thinking of buying these go and pull the trigger on it!
customer_reviews.author: tek

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid L3-2879-R1-Peri Ice Cube Tray Set
product_meta.description: 1 twist of the tray and all cubes drop out. Trays nest for compact storage when not in use and stack neatly in the refrigerator. Surface repels mineral deposits and stays cleaner longer.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars111 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
